title: **Note, you do not need to do any board programming if you want to use the Cyton out-of-the-box.** All OpenBCI boards ship already programmed, i.e. with firmware already uploaded. If you're curious about how we do it, keep reading! If you just want to start streaming EEG/EMG/ECG data right away, head over to [Getting Started.](https://docs.openbci.com/docs/01GettingStarted/GettingStartedLanding)

next.title: **Note, you do not need to do ANY Cyton board or radio module programming if you want to use the Cyton out-of-the-box. All OpenBCI boards and dongles ship already programmed, i.e. with firmware already uploaded.** If you're curious about how we do it, keep reading! If you just want to start streaming EEG/EMG/ECG data right away, head over to [Getting Started.](https://docs.openbci.com/docs/01GettingStarted/GettingStartedLanding)
